descriptionHtml:
Introduction:

I\'m a fan of Nordic culture, and I love the legend of the berserkers in particular. So I decided to create my own race based on my vision of these warriors.

Description:

A long time ago, there were powerful and cruel gods. Humans feared these gods, but there were those who loved and sought glory in the bloodiest battles, they were the Berserkers!
A race barbarous and violent, that use the bears and wolves as symbolos of his strength.
They have the power to enter into frenzy during the fighting, creating havoc and fear!

This breed is a little higher than the Norse normal (1.07 tall men and women 1.05)
The male voice has thicker than normal.
Women have voices fiercest.

They are strong and determined so I suggest starting the game already hard at level >=D

Initial attributes:

Two hands 10
One hand 10
Smithing  5
Light armor 10
Heavy armor 10

powers:

Berserker rage (is the same as the orcs)

resistances:

50% resistance to freezing (such as the Nordic)

50% resistance to diseases with the ability bravely bear

Bonus:

A little bonus HP regeneration during combat, it helps to compensate for the lack of defense by using two-handed weapons and light armor.

installation:

put the contents of the folder berserker within the data folder where the game was installed, or use the Nexus Mod Manage.

Known issues:

I do not know why but whenever I try to use the command showracemenu the second time after the creation of the character\'s hair and beard of the character does not change, only after you select the tab for random body they will appear again but it always ends the fading effect bravery bear from the list.

So I suggest NOT USING option showracemenu after the character is already ready.
If anyone knows how to fix it please help me =/

this is my first mod, I hope you enjoy
suggestions are welcome
